markdownRemark.html: This is an excellent, compact 9 holes par 3 golf course in the center of Marbella that is in perfect condition. There is a fabulous restaurant in the clubhouse to rest and recover after your game.

frontmatter.title: Miguel Ángel Jiménez Golf Academy

frontmatter.address: C/ Corelli s/n., E-29620 Torremolinos, Spain
